name: Thalmor Handler (Ledger-Clerk)

aspects.high_concept: Civilian Disguise Handler Running Dominion Paper Trails

stunts.name: Paper Is a Weapon
stunts.description: Because the handler controls records and informants, gain +2 to Create Advantage with Investigate when constructing a suspect profile from partial clues.

stunts.name: Quiet Contact Web
stunts.description: Once per scene, may spend a free invoke on a city-wide surveillance aspect (if it exists) as if they were present, representing informants.

notes: Looks like a clerk, moves like a spy. Not a frontline Justiciar, but more dangerous in the long game. If threatened, they disappear behind guards and paperwork.
combat_tactics: Avoid combat. Flees, calls for guards, and tries to preserve evidence/witnesses. Prefers ambush setups over confrontation.

scene_triggers.sighting: If the PC leaves a signature trail, the handler advances Thalmor clocks and dispatches probing encounters.

dialogue_samples: Curious. This ink does not match.
Names are less important than patterns.
Every city has its quiet doors. We own several.
